data: Below is a list of all the available Built-in Events within Minecraft:Bedrock Edition for use with Entity JSON files.

data.Description: `minecraft:entity_born` triggers an event calls on an entity when the entity is born via `breeding`.
`minecraft:entity_spawned` triggers an event calls on an entity when the entity is spawned in the world.
`minecraft:entity_transformed` triggers an event call on an entity that transforms into another entity.
`minecraft:on_prime` triggers an event calls on an entity when the entity is set to explode.
